channel.title: Making a 508 client work on a 317 source?
channel.description:
possible?
all i really want is too make a 317 client with working hp tabs up on the mini map. i would preferably not like to use gay sprites that look half a$$ed any way..
thanks if u can help me.
p.s. if there's a client source already like this please link me?

item.title: Making a 508 client work on a 317 source?
item.dc:creator: @hyper1 hyper1
item.description:
@hyper1 wrote:

im not going to download it tho

it has a cache included and will take to long btw

i found a client that has it i will just try and i figure it out by looking at it i guess

btw dds-specz.org

is the client

Read full topic
item.source: Making a 508 client work on a 317 source?

item.title: Making a 508 client work on a 317 source?
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

well since you appologized i guess i can let you “look” at it. It has had all the .java files removed but you can see how it works.
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?kdi4nwtdn2o
In the future though think about how you phrase your questions. First word is “possible?” so i answered it in its entirety.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a 508 client work on a 317 source?

item.title: Making a 508 client work on a 317 source?
item.dc:creator: @hyper1 hyper1
item.description:
@hyper1 wrote:

thanks and but i already knew that u can use sprites but the client i saw like that was more like the old mopar 317 with like a small picture posted in the top right corner that just covered the minimap a bit. and the other side was the “orb” thing u guys are talking about just posted there and none of it matched.

if someone could direct me to a sprites tutorial ?

or how to change the frame that would be pretty cool.

thanks @all for all your help

And @grim
sorry but sean was right all i wanted was to see it. i have an existing client i wouldnt just ditch it.
and sorry for over reacting i guess u could call it

Read full topic
item.source: Making a 508 client work on a 317 source?

item.title: Making a 508 client work on a 317 source?
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

[quote=“sean99, post:16, topic:251667”][quote author=Trigger* link=topic=332247.msg2592595#msg2592595 date=1229841234]
If you are not going to appreciate people trying to help don’t post this thread at all then.
[/quote]

Telling someone you know of a client that does work with 317 and 508 but you’re not going to give them the link is just childish. That’s like telling a 3 year old that you have a sucker but they can’t have it. All you had to say was yes it is possible.[/quote]
Read his question…he asked if it was possible. I did help by informing him it was. I dont want my friends work leeched. I answered his question so kindly gtfo

Read full topic

project fubergen has the things where your hp ones go down it does also with run and prayer…but all you need to do is get the maps of the 508 into the 317 to look cool

item.title: Making a 508 client work on a 317 source?
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:

if you want help here. All you need to do is take the frame of a 508 client and the orb sprites and put them in a regular 317 client. No more help than that…

item.title: Making a 508 client work on a 317 source?
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:11, topic:251667”][quote author=Xx R A G 3 R link=topic=332247.msg2592653#msg2592653 date=1229847400]

I have seen one so it is possible. Same 317 gameplay and server but with 508 frames and orbs. I wont give you link for client as it is only one i have seen, but it is possible
[/quote] doubt it i personally don’t think this is possible.

Changing sprites in a client is a simple task.[/quote] idk if im looking at this the right way, basically he saying he wants 508 sprites on his 317 client? or does he want 317 sprites on his 508 client? lol.
